story.kicker_image_caption: The all new TVS XL 100's bold styling is complemented with attractive and vibrant graphics and comes in five colours of black, red, green, blue and grey.
story.storybody:
Adding a new chapter to its iconic brand, TVS Motor Company on Thursday announced the launch of its new four stroke TVS XL 100 in Delhi. The all new TVS XL 100 has been designed to meet the evolving needs of today's customer.

ALSO READ: TVS launches Scooty Zest 110 'Himalayan Highs' Special Edition

The all new TVS XL 100 is powered by a 99.7cc four stroke engine which effortlessly delivers  4.2PS power with excellent initial pick up and a top speed of 60kmph.  TVS XL 100 returns best in class mileage of 67 kmpl (among all auto-geared two wheelers) under simulated test conditions as per TVS Motor standards.

J S Srinivasan, Vice President Sales and Service, TVS Motor Company said, "This launch reiterates our commitment to deliver high quality, customer centric products and also underlines our commitment to continually establish a strong brand connect with our customers.

ALSO READ:  Did you know these 10 things about Shreya Iyer

The all-new four stroke moped TVS XL 100 has been designed to meet the evolving needs of today's customer and is one of the most affordable, reliable, easy to ride, powerful multi-utility two wheelers in the market. We are confident that TVS XL 100 will garner high levels of customer satisfaction and will be well received in the market place."

The all new TVS XL 100 comes with a seat which is broader and more comfortable. It also has a detachable rear seat with a robust rear flatbed platform to enable carrying of loads. The front platform of the all new TVS XL 100 is wider and longer so as to enable more space.  Easy centre stand, (patent pending), which makes parking the vehicle easier and improves stability while the vehicle is on stand.

ALSO READ:  TVS Akula 310 to be renamed as TVS Apache RTR 300

The all new TVS XL 100's bold styling is complemented with attractive and vibrant graphics and comes in five colours of black, red, green, blue and grey.

Along with TVS XL Super and TVS XL Super Heavy Duty, TVS XL 100 is currently available across all TVS dealerships in Rajasthan. TVS XL is priced at Rs 30,174 (ex showroom, New Delhi).
story.shortheadline: TVS Motor launches TVS XL 100 in Delhi; prices start at Rs 30,174
